project.description: Create packages from multiple processes If package with the same version exists, a new package is not created.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: packageVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Version of the Package to be created

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: createdBy
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the engineer creating the package

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd ${SCRIPTS_HOME} saveNotes="${notes}" saveCreatedBy="${createdBy}" savePackageVersion="${packageVersion}"
IFS=',' ;for processName in `echo "${processNames}"`; do notes="${saveNotes}" packageVersion="${savePackageVersion}" createdBy="${saveCreatedBy}" processName=`echo "${processName}" | xargs` saveProcessName="${processName}" source bin/queryProcess.sh processName=${processName} source bin/createPackagedComponent.sh componentId=${componentId} componentType="Process" packageVersion=${packageVersion} notes="${notes}" createdBy=${createdBy} echo "Created package ${packageId} for process ${saveProcessName}" done
